/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import Logo from "../img/logo.png"; import Search from "../img/search.png"; import Cart from "../img/cart.png"; import Member from "../img/member.png"; import { useState } from "react"; function Header() { const [keyword, setKeyword] = useState(""); const [isSearchOpen, setIsSearchOpen] = useState(false); function setSearchKeyword(e) { setKeyword(e.target.value); } function search(e) { if (e.key === "Enter") { window.location.href = `./products.html?keyword=${keyword}`; } } function toggleSearch() { setIsSearchOpen(!isSearchOpen); } return (
女裝 男裝 配件

1

); } export default Header;
